thread.title: Fight with UK's Brook also in the pipeline for Pacquiao
thread.title_full: Fight with UK's Brook also in the pipeline for Pacquiao

title: Fight with UK's Brook also in the pipeline for Pacquiao
text:
Sportshub ( Leaderboard Top ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: 1 Fight with UK's Brook also in the pipeline for Pacquiao By Dino Maragay (philstar.com) | Updated January 12, 2017 - 4:04pm Manny Pacquiao and Kell Brook | AP 
MANILA, Philippines – Manny Pacquiao might also take on British fighter Kell Brook as one of his assignments this year. 
This after Brook’s promoter, Eddie Hearn of Matchroom Sport, confirmed that he’s in touch with Top Rank Inc. Bob Arum for a fight with Pacquiao. 
“I have been speaking with Bob Arum about a Kell Brook versus Manny Pacquiao fight," Hearn recently told Sky Sports. 
Brook (36-1, 25 KOs) is the reigning IBF welterweight champion who tried his luck at middleweight but got knocked out by Gennady Golovkin in September last year. 
Pacquiao could face Brook in the United Kingdom sometime this year as part of Arum’s plan to launch a world tour for the Filipino icon . 
But first, Pacquiao must deal with Australian Jeff Horn on April 23 at a still to be determined venue. Sportshub ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: 1 
Hearn, for his part, said Brook is willing to wait for Pacquiao, who, if he retains his WBO welterweight crown against Horn, could unify titles with the British star. 
"We are ready to go with that right now, but I think they like the idea of fighting Horn first, so we will now try and work for an Autumn fight,” he added. Sportshub ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: 1
